languages.text: "Нет". {n}Звенящий голос Ирлиэт разбивается эхом о стены шпиля.{/n} "Ты дал{mf||а} обещание, которое не сумел{mf||а} сдержать, а природная жадность {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} не позволяет тебе отпустить меня. Но ты не в силах лишить дитя Азуриана выбора. Прощай, элантах. На этом наши пути расходятся".

traits.locale_text: "Нет". {n}Звенящий голос Ирлиэт разбивается эхом о стены шпиля.{/n} "Ты дал{mf||а} обещание, которое не сумел{mf||а} сдержать, а природная жадность {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} не позволяет тебе отпустить меня. Но ты не в силах лишить дитя Азуана выбора. Прощай, элантах. На этом наши пути расходятся".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "No." {n}Yrliet's resonant voice breaks into small echoes brightly against the spire's walls.{/n} "You made a promise and failed to keep it, and now the greed in your {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} nature stops you from letting me go. But you cannot take freedom of choice away from a Child of Asuryan. Farewell, elantach. This is where we part ways."
languages.original_text: "Нет". {n}Звенящий голос Ирлиэт разбивается эхом о стены шпиля.{/n} "Ты дал{mf||а} обещание, которое не сумел{mf||а} сдержать, а природная жадность {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} не позволяет тебе отпустить меня. Но ты не в силах лишить дитя Азуриана выбора. Прощай, элантах. На этом наши пути расходятся".

But you cannot take freedom of choice away from a child of Asuryan. Farewell, elantach. This is where we part ways."

traits.locale_text: "No." {n}Yrliet's resonant voice breaks into small echoes brightly against the spire's walls.{/n} "You made a promise and failed to keep it, and now the greed in your {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} nature stops you from letting me go. But you cannot take freedom of choice away from a Child of Asuryan. Farewell, elantach. This is where we part ways."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No». {n}La estentórea negativa de Yrliet reverbera en las murallas de la torre.{/n} «Me hiciste una promesa y no la has cumplido, y ahora tu naturaleza avariciosa de {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} no consiente que me marche. Pero no puedes arrebatar el libre albedrío a una hija de Asuryan. Adiós, elantach. Aquí es donde nos separamos».
languages.original_text: "No." {n}Yrliet's resonant voice breaks into small echoes brightly against the spire's walls.{/n} "You made a promise and failed to keep it, and now the greed in your {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} nature stops you from letting me go. But you cannot take freedom of choice away from a Child of Asuryan. Farewell, elantach. This is where we part ways."

traits.locale_text: «No». {n}La estentórea negativa de Yrliet reverbera en las murallas de la torre.{/n} «Me hiciste una promesa y no la has cumplido, y ahora tu naturaleza avariciosa de {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} no consiente que me marche. Pero no puedes arrebatar el libre albedrío a una hija de Asuryan. Adiós, elantach. Aquí es donde nos separamos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「断る」{n}ユリエットの朗々たる声が尖塔の壁に明るく小さな反響音を響かせる。{/n}「あなたは約束を守れなかった。そして今、あなたたち{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}の本性である貪欲さが、我を手放さんとしている。だが、アシュリアンの御子から選択の自由を奪うことなどできない。さらばだ、エランタよ。ここでお別れだ」
languages.original_text: "No." {n}Yrliet's resonant voice breaks into small echoes brightly against the spire's walls.{/n} "You made a promise and failed to keep it, and now the greed in your {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} nature stops you from letting me go. But you cannot take freedom of choice away from a Child of Asuryan. Farewell, elantach. This is where we part ways."

traits.locale_text: 「断る」{n}ユリエットの朗々たる声が尖塔の壁に明るく小さな反響音を響かせる。{/n}「あなたは約束を守れなかった。そして今、あなたたち{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}の本性である貪欲さが、我を手放さんとしている。だが、アシュリアンの御子から選択の自由を奪うことなどできない。さらばだ、エランタよ。ここでお別れだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “不行。”{n}伊莉耶特洪亮的声音碰在尖塔的墙壁上，碎成细微的回声。{/n}“你许下了诺言，但却没有遵守。出于{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}天性中的贪婪，你不肯放我离开，但你也别想剥夺阿苏焉子嗣的自由。永别了，外界人，我们就在这里分道扬镳吧。”
languages.original_text: "No." {n}Yrliet's resonant voice breaks into small echoes brightly against the spire's walls.{/n} "You made a promise and failed to keep it, and now the greed in your {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} nature stops you from letting me go. But you cannot take freedom of choice away from a Child of Asuryan. Farewell, elantach. This is where we part ways."

traits.locale_text: “不行。”{n}伊莉耶特洪亮的声音碰在尖塔的墙壁上，碎成细微的回声。{/n}“你许下了诺言，但却没有遵守。出于{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}天性中的贪婪，你不肯放我离开，但你也别想剥夺阿苏焉子嗣的自由。永别了，外界人，我们就在这里分道扬镳吧。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Non. » {n}La voix sonore d'Yrliet rompt le silence et résonne entre les murs de la tour.{/n} « Vous m'avez fait une promesse que vous n'avez pas tenue et maintenant, votre cupidité de {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} vous empêche de me laisser partir. Mais vous ne pouvez pas voler son libre arbitre à une enfant d'Asuryan. Au revoir, elantach. C'est ici que nos chemins se séparent. »
languages.original_text: "No." {n}Yrliet's resonant voice breaks into small echoes brightly against the spire's walls.{/n} "You made a promise and failed to keep it, and now the greed in your {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} nature stops you from letting me go. But you cannot take freedom of choice away from a Child of Asuryan. Farewell, elantach. This is where we part ways."

traits.locale_text: « Non. » {n}La voix sonore d'Yrliet rompt le silence et résonne entre les murs de la tour.{/n} « Vous m'avez fait une promesse que vous n'avez pas tenue et maintenant, votre cupidité de {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} vous empêche de me laisser partir. Mais vous ne pouvez pas voler son libre arbitre à une enfant d'Asuryan. Au revoir, elantach. C'est ici que nos chemins se séparent. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Nein." {n}Yrliets klangvolle Stimme zerschellt an den Wänden des Turms in kleine Echos.{/n} "Ihr habt ein Versprechen gegeben und es nicht eingehalten, und jetzt lässt Eure Gier als {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} nicht zu, dass ich gehe. Aber man kann einem Kind von Asuryan nicht seine Entscheidungsfreiheit nehmen. Lebt wohl, Elantach. Hier trennen sich unsere Wege."
languages.original_text: "No." {n}Yrliet's resonant voice breaks into small echoes brightly against the spire's walls.{/n} "You made a promise and failed to keep it, and now the greed in your {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} nature stops you from letting me go. But you cannot take freedom of choice away from a Child of Asuryan. Farewell, elantach. This is where we part ways."

traits.locale_text: "Nein." {n}Yrliets klangvolle Stimme zerschellt an den Wänden des Turms in kleine Echos.{/n} "Ihr habt ein Versprechen gegeben und es nicht eingehalten, und jetzt lässt Eure Gier als {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} nicht zu, dass ich gehe. Aber man kann einem Kind von Asuryan nicht seine Entscheidungsfreiheit nehmen. Lebt wohl, Elantach. Hier trennen sich unsere Wege."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Hayır." {n}Yrliet'in gür sesi, kulenin duvarlarından yankılanarak minik minik aksediyor.{/n} "Bana verdiğin sözü tutmadın. Şimdi de {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} tabiatından gelen tamahkârlıkla gitmeme engel oluyorsun. Fakat bir Asuryan'ın Çocuğu'ndan seçim özgürlüğünü alamazsın. Elveda elantach. Burada yollarımız ayrılıyor."
languages.original_text: "No." {n}Yrliet's resonant voice breaks into small echoes brightly against the spire's walls.{/n} "You made a promise and failed to keep it, and now the greed in your {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} nature stops you from letting me go. But you cannot take freedom of choice away from a Child of Asuryan. Farewell, elantach. This is where we part ways."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır." {n}Yrliet'in çınlayan sesi, kulenin duvarlarından hayat dolu minik yankılar hâlinde dağılıyor.{/n} "Bana bir söz verdin ama o sözü tutamadın. Şimdi de {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} tabiatından gelen tamahkârlıkla gitmeme müsaade etmiyorsun. Fakat bir Asuryan'ın Çocuğu'ndan seçim özgürlüğünü alamazsın. Elveda elantach. Burada yollarımız ayrılıyor."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
